descriptionParagraphs: Custom functions enable developers to add new functions to Excel by defining those functions in JavaScript as part of an add-in. Users within Excel can access custom functions just as they would any native function in Excel, such as SUM().

items.name: Custom functions in Excel
items.description: Custom functions enable you to add new functions to Excel by defining those functions in JavaScript as part of an add-in

items.name: Custom Functions - Special Add-in Samples
items.description: The primary repo for Custom Functions-related samples, tools, and forums is Excel-Custom-Functions.
